author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Ebìó Òvʉ́ó Rʉ Rɨ̀
description: Èbìó ànɨ̀káníkà rʉ́ rɨ̀ lè àfa nyazà tʉ̀ te lènɨ́ àzí nyaká a'dɨ́zʉ́ rɨ̀ ngá kʉ. Esú lókìrí àzɨ́nɨ fèzʉ' èrɨ mà agyípɨ́ yɨnɨ́ ecózʉ́ èrɨ omvezʉ́ sâ nyaká nɨ́ ofʉzʉ́ 'bo rɨ̀ sɨ̀ nɨ. Te drìléònzɨ́ rʉ́ lókìrí 'dà nga drìléònzɨ́ fě bè èrɨnɨ́ ànɨ'dà banɨ e'yó fěpɨ ànɨ̀kánɨ́kà yɨ mà pá yɨnɨ́ ovʉzʉ èzʉ́ èzʉ́ àzɨ́nɨ èzɨ́á èzɨ́á rɨ̀ 'ɨ́.
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: No Ɗayu Faaborii Wuugaandu.
description: Ceeɗu ngun no yoorii, ɗaaloolu pamaru ngun ɗomɗaama. Ngu ɓattii weendu ndun faa ngu yara, ammaa ndiyam ɗam dillidi e maggu, naako wuugaandu faabiingu. Noye  ɗaaloolu ngun yettirta wuugaandu ndun.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Amazaribwa ga lynne
description: Lyn yankora bingi kufuna ebintu bwo okwetenkatera amazaribwa ge, bayonsya omuganti basisa ebitubyona.
author: DAPHINE NATUKWASA

title: U pembelele luṱavule
description: Nkanyedzi o lindela u pembelela luṱavula fhedzi vha dzulapo vha Ndlovu vho xedza muya wa u pembela.
author: Maphaha Tshimangadzo Nelson

title: Lwashiina Wanaasi Nabubi Ali Ni Buukyele Shinaane Buunyelele
description: Wanaasi Nabubi akana naabi khuulya, ne nga s'akana khuuraamba kumulimo kwe khuuteekha  biilyo ta. Aryo wambaasa khu saambo iye lukyesilukyesi isi basaale beewe banyala baamumanyisamo nga biilyo byaabwe byashiile. Ne she khabi imbi ndi, kamakyesi kano kaalekha khumuyeeta ta, ni shishamamwo, waakila waaba ni buukyele buunyelele buuleeyi
author: Milton Eridad Shissa

title: Nampay' oomame
description: Leli iculo labantwana lesiZulu elitholakala encwadini ebizwa 'Songs Sung by South African Children' (1990,  1992 and 2002) eshicilelwe ngabakwa Grassroots Adult Education and Training Trust.
author: Liz Brouckaert

title: Yadda Tururuwa Ta Ceci Habjia
description: Daji ya bushe,  kuma tururuwa ta ji ƙishirwa. Ta kusanto tabki don ta sha ruwa amma sai ruwan suka tafi da ita kafin habjiya ta ceceta. Yaya tururuwa za ta godewa habjiyar?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Namudira N'ehita
description: Olwolire ng'ebaayo hu hyalo hy'e Bubali omusaaja n'omuhasi wuwe ko n'omwana wawe mulala ni bamulanga baati Namudira.
author: Ivan Kaibo

title: Kayanga n'eibuga lye
description: Olufumo luno lwogera ku ka Kayanga akaghala akaafiirwa bazaaire baako. Okufiirwa kwako,  n'obulumi bwakwo bikaleetera okuja ku magombe ga bazaire baako nga kanoonhia okugumizibwa. Kaweebwa ekirabo eky'eibuga ery'endhawulo era mu ibuga eryo kawulira nga oti bazaaire baako baligho.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Anansi Omunafu
description: Haŋambi oyu balanga Namumbirya genda bugali ohulya aye sigenda hunyiiya. Kale asala olugesi abahye bamulange ni binyiiye alye hulya. Ehy'ekabi embi olugesi olwo silwamuholera era ehyo nj'ehyaŋwaho ko abe n'amagulu amaleeŋi.
author: Bukheye Mulongo Christopher

title: Dimakatso tsa letsatsi la matswalo a Lynne
description: Lynne o entse mosebetsi o mongata a bokella dintho tsa mokete wa letsatsi la hae la tswalo,  empa na kuku e tjheleng e tla senya dintho tsohle?
author: Matilda Dube

title: Ku Famba U Lavana Na Nchumu Lowu Nga Na Khombo Hi Ximun'Wana
description: Nkanyezi a nga yimelangi nkhuvo wa Ximun'wana,  kambe vanhu va ka Ndlovu va lahlekeriwile hi moya wun'we wa vona wa ku tlangela.
author: Mkomati John Mongwe

title: Ifyo Kanyelele Aapuswishe Inkunda
description: Umushili nauma. Akanyelele kali neecilaka saana. Kaaya kumumana mukunwa amenshi nomba bakapyangila kumo naamenshi. Inkunda yapususha akanyelele. Nomba akanyelele katashishe shani inkunda?
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Namukhaywa
description: Story of a man whose wife bore him girls only threatens that if she gave birth to another girl he would leave her but would throw a party for her if she bore him a son. The wife goes to the mid-wife and gives birth to twin. Find out what she did next.
author: Raschel Lourens

title: Hoe Die Nag Aan Opio Se Dorp Gekom Het
description: There is no night time in Opio's village. One day he goes hunting and arrives at a place he doesn't know. When night falls there, Opio thinks he has gone blind. Then he discovers the truth and likes night so much that he takes it to his own village.
author: Erin Armstrong

title: Kayánga Ó Emókór Enyé
description: Kélimu éná átiní Kayánga, esilá oó ilarín tómôn naitubúlua entásât áísínání mórúo peê eyé intóiwúó ényená. Néya osomít ó emíón meshómo aishirakí inkuráren oó intóiwúó enyéna. Néítodolí te olmonekíé lé mókór ajó kébóítare énaaké, néyáki iná mokór enkíléjíléj. Néning Kayanga entiî é ng'ótónyé te oó isínkoliotín ó ínâ mókór.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Kokwane Ipiliselize Inkunda
description: Akasuba kalibalika sana mu mpanga mushinta yalusuba.
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Lusuku lwekutalwa lwaLynne
description: Lynne wenta umsebenti lomnyenti kakhulu alungisa tintfo telidzili lakhe lekugubha lusuku lwekutalwa kwakhe,  kodvwa nje likhekhe lelishile lingamosha konkhe?
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Munansi Omunafu
description: Ensonga lwaki ba Nawumbuli bali na bugulu butono. (Kili ni ku Luse 4.).
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Ndayanda Kubala
description: Nibata Kubala. Kimani yonikabalela? Nikaipalela ninosi?
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Namukhaywa (Song In English)
description: Story of a man whose wife bore him girls only threatens that if she gave birth to another girl he would leave her but would throw a party for her if she bore him a son. The wife goes to the mid-wife and gives birth to twin. Find out what she did next.
author: Raschel Lourens

title: (Colour-in) Man and Lion
description: Tells how a man escapes from certain death.
author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Utjhontjhwani usindisa izuba
description: Indawo yomile utjhontjhwani womele amanzi khulu. Waya emlanjeni wayokusela bewakhamba. Utjhontjhwani usindisa izuba.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Hoe Sebra Sy Strepe Gekry Het
description: Dapper Sebra en Bobbejaan. (This story was donated by LAPA Publishers.)
author: Jaco jacobs

title: Khayanga Ka Etwo Keng
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a 10 year old girl who is taken in by a distant, poor and frail relative after the death of her parents.  Her loss and pain lead her to seek guidance and comfort from her parents' graves.  As a sign that they are always with her, she is miraculously given the gift of a very special gourd and it becomes the source of comfort and good luck. Khayanga experiences the presence of her mother through songs and this special gourd.
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Nambumbi omugayaavu
description: Ensonga lwaki Nawumbuli Nambumbi ali no obugulu obuleeyiriri.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Namukwana (Lwembo Mu Lusoga)
description: Lugero lwa musaadha eyali ni mukazi we nga amuzaalira baana ba bughala beerere. Meni yaatisa muzaiwe ati bwanazaala omwana owundi owobughala aidha kumuleka ati aye aidha kumukolera akabaga bwanamuzaalira owobulenzi. Omukazi aja ewomusawo omuzaalisa era yaazaala abalongo. Noonia kiki kyairaku okukola.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Wamachina  Nakhamuka Khe
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a little girl whose parents died. Her loss and pain lead her to seek comfort from her parents' graves. She is miraculously given the gift of a special gourd, and through this gourd she experiences the presence of her parents.
author: Catherine Were

title: Káínyoo Peê Éátâ Anansi Inkejék Ísíet Rónkéní
description: Kényor Anansi, olkéndî, ainósa endáa, káke imeyíéú néyierishó. Néíng'oru olosék olikínye ilchóreta lényená áajoki eó endáâ. Káke eitú easishó olósék lénye.Óre enataáse náa ninyé oshî peê éátâ ilkendín inkejék naáado.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: فریدہ کی دعوت
description: Farida

title: నెమలి
description: నెమలి గూరించి .

title: Review of Introduction and Unit 1 -- Unit 5
How Zebra got his stripes
description: Brave Zebra saves the day. (This story was donated by LAPA Publishers.).
author: Jaco jacobs

title: Man and Lion
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Mozambican folktale

title: Indlela imbovane eyalihlangula ngayo ihobe
description: Eli libali elingembovane eyemka namanzi yaze yancedwa lihobe ekurhaxweni. Nayo yafuna ukulibuyekeza ngoncedo layo. Yalihlangula kumakhwenkwe awayefuna ukulitya.
author: Siyamthanda Jiza

title: Namukhaywa
description: Story of a man whose wife bore him girls only threatens that if she gave birth to another girl he would kill her but would throw a party for her if she bore him a son. The wife goes to the mid-wife and gives birth to twin. Find out what she did next.
author: Matthews M Wanga

title: Wamphephisa Kanjani Utsheketshe Ujuba
description: Kwakomise kakhulu ezweni uTsheketshe omncane wayenxanwe kakhulu. Wehlela emfuleni ukuyophuza kodwa amanzi amshanelela le kude. Wasizwa uJuba. Kodwa naye wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uyabonga.
author: Zimbili Dlamini

title: Khayanga le nkgo
description: Kanegelo e bolela ka Khayanga,  mosetsanyana yoo batswadi ba gagwe ba hlokofetsego. Go loba le mahloko a gagwe a dira gore a ye go nyaka khomotso mabitleng a batswadi ba gagwe. Mohlolo o ile wa direga ge a fiwa nkgo ya mehlolo,  yeo e mo thusago go ikwa a sa lahlega,  eke batswadi ba gagwe ba nale yena.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Eyakar Anansi Ng'Akejen Ngakan-Kauni Nadiim
description: Emina asimokok Anansi akimuj nabo nyesaki akipore akimuj. Abu ng'esi kitam ng'irotin daang ng'ulu epedoreta ng'ipalon keng akitaanyun ng'esi nacha ekonio akimuj kech. Kang'una kadaang apotu ng'itamen keng kichanyut ng'akiro naronok ng'esi tokona eyakatar ng'asimokokia ng'ikejen lodiim lukooyak.
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: Hoender en Duisendpoot
description: Hoender en Duisendpoot het 'n baie mededingende vriendskap. Eendag verloor Hoender. Sy word toe so kwaad dat sy iets leliks aanvang.
author: Kaylee Spence

title: Manu and the Lion
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Namunyu Ni Wangwe
description: Hyena and leopard were good friends.
author: Mubbalya Charles

title: UTsheketshe usindisa uJuba
description: Kwakomise kakhulu ezweni uTsheketshe omncane wayenxanwe kakhulu. Wehlela emfuleni ukuyophuza kodwa amanzi amshanelela le kude. Wasizwa uJuba. Kodwa naye wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uyabonga.
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Anansi Nakalany
description: Eger lo anyunia asimokok ng'akejen nadiim tarai nakooyak.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Holiday Experience
description: Mrs Clark gave her pupils a holiday assignment. Her pupils must draw what they enjoyed most during their holidays. The pupils draw some of the best tourist attractions in Africa.
author: Blessing Nemadziva

title: Khayanga le nkgo ya gagwe
description: Kanegelo ke ya mosetsanyana yoo ba rego ke Khayanga. O be a sotlega morago ga gore batswadi ba gagwe ba hlokofale. Yena o ile a ya mabitleng a bona go nyaka thušo. Mohlolo wa nkgo wa diragala gona mabitleng ao gomme go tloga tšatši leo,  Khayanga a bona thušo go tšwa batswading ba gagwe.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Mtu na Simba
description: Jinsi mtu anaepuka kifo.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Nana Ne Lavi
description: Buli muntu atekeddwa okubeera n`obuvunanyizibwa ku ngeri gyalabirira mu abaana abato. Olugero lino lwogera ku muwala Lavi eyalemererwa okulabirira omwana omuto kubanga naye yalina emyaka munaana gyoka.
author: Annet Ssebaggala

title: Moipone Le Sego Sa Gagwe
description: Mosidi o sirelediwa ke sego sa gagwe.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Esichira Anansi Naba Norulenje Orutiti Munane
description: Anansi Olububi yachama okhulia, na siyachama mirimo nomba okhutekha tawe. Akasia liparo ngala abetsa bebe banyala khumumanyia  fiakhulia fiabo nifiakhayia.
author: Catherine Were

title: Fudu Kanguwu Bolboloa Cǝkkaanadǝ.
description: Duniadǝ ngamndu, kanguwudǝ ngudunjua. Falwuro ingi njaro kadinniya, tia ingi cadi duwon bolbolo kikkawo. Ndayin kanguwudǝ bolboloa wuseji?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Home Alone
description: What happens when you are left alone at home? Here is Shadrack's experience.
author: Shadrack Abel Mpuru

title: Nana ni Lavi
description: Buli muntu ateekwa okuba nh'obuvunaanizibwa ku ngeri y'alabiriramu abaana abato. Olugero luno luyogera ku mughala Lavi eyalemererwa okulabirira omwana omuto kubanga yeena yali ali ne emyaka munaana gy'onka.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Omusajja N'empologoma
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Ritah Katetemera

title: Siafu amwokoa Njiwa
description: Nchi ni kavu mno na Siafu Mdogo anahisi kiu. Anapoenda mtoni kutafuta maji,  anapelekwa na mawimbi. Njiwa anaokoa maisha ya Siafu Mdogo. Ni vipi Siafu Mdogo anatoa shukurani zake kwa Njiwa?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Anansi omutofu
description: Anansi omutofu abohanga obuusi khushilenje nende khunyungu eyeshimuna.
author: Peter Mandu

title: Honourable Father
description: Its a short story of a young boy who tells the story about his father. His father was working at the mines and use to go home only once a year, during festive season. He loved his family and the community in the village appreciated him not only because of the school he build but the leadership and organisational kills he has.
author: Sylvester Moerane Kgaladi

title: Kayanga Nda Nga Zolla
description: Kayanga hayrayey bu, amma i dira ga zollo fo kaŋ gonda asiiri naŋ a se. zolla na nga nd'ey maanandi care. Amma han fo zolla na nga baguyaŋ te.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Kambe ni zaakayo omuzizigavu
description: Tukobere engeri kambe jeyemulula ku kufa.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Nangbansuuri
description: Nangbansuuri neema: M Ba wuri koko,  Ti wuri kokokyɛbakyɛba.
author: Midzira Charles

title: Adurreef Hantuuta
description: Jaarsi Hantuutaa beeka ta'e yommuu diinni sobee firaa fakkaatuu qophiin barbachisa ta'u isaa barsiisa.
author: Mulualem Daba

title: Nanziri N'Endeku
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a 10 year old girl who is taken in by a distant, poor and frail relative after the death of her parents.  Her loss and pain lead her to seek guidance and comfort from her parents' graves.  As a sign that they are always with her, she is miraculously given the gift of a very special gourd and it becomes the source of comfort and good luck. Khayanga experiences the presence of her mother through songs and this special gourd.
author: Rebecca Kuteesa

title: Anansi Preguiçoso
description: O aranhiço Anansi adora comer, mas não quer ter o trabalho de preparar uma refeição. Tem uma ideia brilhante sobre como os seus amigos o podem avisar de quando a comida está pronta.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Engeri Enkuyege Bwe Yataasa Ejjuba
description: Mukyeya etaka kalu nnyo ate nga Enkuyege erina enyonta. Egenda ku mugga okunywa ku mazzi n'etwalibwa omuyaga. Ejjuba ne litaasa obulamu bw'Enkuyege. Enkuyege yebaza etya Ejjuba?
author: Rebecca Kuteesa

title: Hope is a Peanut Butter Sandwich
description: This poem describes young mens' feelings when they receive a little bit of food.
author: Johanna Kistner

title: Omusaadha aghona Mpologoma
description: Etukobera engeri omusaadha yeyawunhunsukamu okufa ku kakuuku.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Anansi and Vulture
description: Anansi is poor, but his friend Rabbit is a prosperous farmer. Anansi is jealous, and finds a way to take over his friend's farm. He makes a lot of money selling Rabbit's fruit and vegetables. But one day on the way home from the market, something happens to change Anansi's fortunes again.
author: Ghanaian folktale

title: Little Jo and the Squabs
description: This is a story about a Little Boy observing the Pigeons and their young ones (squabs).

title: 玩具車大賽
description: 四個小孩，四台玩具車。他們決定來場比賽！誰會贏呢？

title: No, I Shan't Eat!
description: A story about the struggle of a mother to make her picky child eat!

title: 啊！足球！
description: 兩個男孩在幫祖母買鹽和油的路上，開始和他們的朋友玩足球！

title: Narrow Escape
description: The story is about a woman and her pet cat.
author: Beatres Nabune

title: Hantuutaf Adurre
description: Dulooman hantuuta kuni diina sobee hiriiyya fakkaatu yommuu nu mudatu akka abshaaluummaan jalaa miiliqnu nugorsa.
author: Mulualem  Daba

title: How colours came together in the sky
description: A little girl teaches her sister about why rainbows are in the sky. (This story was created at a Story Making Workshop in Abuja,  2018,  co-hosted by African Storybook and the British Council Nigeria).
author: Zainab Ayoza Omaki

title: Ogulegua Pa A'Balau Ni Ngoni Ru Ya Ri
description: Angu ‘wi tu dika yi vico nde Ogulegua ni ambamba. Mu yi ara tia ‘dale yi mvu te yi ‘du eri ra. A'balau epa Agulegua ma idri. Ogulegua fe di A'balau ni awa'difo geri ngo si ya?
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Omusaadha n'empologoma
description: Lugero lutukobera omusaadha bweyaghona okufa.
author: Abdul Maged Mbago

title: Anansi en Vulture
description: Anansi is poor, but his friend Rabbit is a prosperous farmer. Anansi is jealous, and finds a way to take over his friend's farm. He makes a lot of money selling Rabbit's fruit and vegetables. But one day on the way home from the market, something happens to change Anansi's fortunes again.
author: Ghanaian folktale

title: አይጦችና ድመቶች
description: ልጆች! ከብልሁ ሽማግሌ አይጥ የምንማረው፣ ጠላቶቻችን ወዳጅ መስለው ሲያስመስሉ ሁልጊዜ ለማምለጥ መዘጋጀት እንደሚኖርብን ነው፡፡
author: Dawit  Girma

title: Ndachama Okhusoma
description: Esomerekho wina?
author: Khabukoshe ASb Team

title: Ingeli Isi Iswa Yayeta Liwuusi
description: Eitakali ikalu era nookaabe alina enyota. Naye onkabe yafuna amaizi?
author: Denis Nasangha

title: Yadda launuka suka hadu a sararin sama
description: Yarinya ta koya ƴar'uwan ta dalilin da ya sa bakan-gizo suna sararin sama.
author: Zainab Ayoza Omaki

title: O Homem E O Leão
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Jorge Eusébio Eusébio

title: Anansi en Aasvoël
description: Anansi die spinnekop is baie arm, maar sy vriend Rabbit is 'n ryk en suksesvolle boer. Anansi is nog altyd jaloers op Rabbit, so hy het 'n manier gevind om sy vriend Rabbit se plaas oor te vat. Hy maak baie geld deur Rabbit se vrugte en groente by die mark te verkoop. Eendag opad terug huis toe van die mark af het iets met Anansi gebeur. Anansi se rykdom en toekoms sal weer verander.
author: Emily Aling

title: Cesta časem
description: Nečekané dobrodružství zvědavého chlapce.

title: Ndakunda kushoma
description: Ogu mugane gurakwata aha mwojjo muto orakunda kushoma emigane. Ara kukunda munoga arenda kubagana omugane ne eka yeye.
author: Isolde Kabajema

title: Imirio Keda Ikapai
description: Isisianakin oni emiri lo apolon ebe ne ituputoroto lu asurupi kon araun ipepero kon,  ekot jo okapakina akerit awaai.
author: Betty Atima

title: Uko Amabara Yabaye Umwe mu Kirere
description: Umwana muto w' umukobwa yigishije murumuna we impamvu imikororombya iba mu kirere.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Nseete Ayamba Kaghemba
description: Eitaka ikalu era eige lili nhonta. Lija ku mwiga okunhwa era amaadhi galyeyagho.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Umugabo n'Intare
description: Uko umuntu yakize urupfu. Ntabwo yariwe n'Intare.
author: Julius  Bazanyamaso

title: Unit 9: English for Specific Purposes, Vocational Language
A Wanuna Ni Nghonyamu
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Rafael Ernesto Samuel

title: Naming amines
description: In this tutorial, Sal shows how to name amines.

title: Cats and mice
description: A wise old mouse teaches us that when your enemies pretend to be your friends,  you must be ready to run away. (This story was originally narrated by MergaDebelo. The English version was written by Elizabeth Laird.).
author: Merga Debelo

title: Anansi Keda Atarukot
description: Erai Anansi lo ican,  konye opeperoke Ipoo erai akorion lo abaran. Anansi erai loingobelono,  ido emoi epone lo ayangor emanikor opaperoke. Iswamai ikapun lu ipu agwelanar araito keda idiyasio ke Ipoo. Konye adope aparan nepe ebonguni osokoni,  obu ice ibore iswamaun osodi ajulakin bobo arereng ke Anansi.
author: Betty Atima

title: Engeri Enswa Yeyaghonia  Eighemba
description: Eitaka ikalu ate Akaswa kayonta. Kagya ku mwiga okunhwa kayeyebwa.
author: Bishop Willis CPTC Student Teachers

title: Jinsi rangi zilivyokuja pamoja angani
description: Msichana mdogo anamfunza dadake kuhuhsu kwa nini pinde ziko angani. (Hadithi hii iliandikwa katika Waksha iliyoandaliwa Abuja,  Nigeria,  2018,  kwa ushirikiano kati ya British Council na African Storybook).
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: (Colour-in) Monkey And Crocodile
description: Crocodiles are dangerous,  but are they smart?
author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Mice and cats
description: A wise old mouse teaches us that when your enemies pretend to be your friends,  you must be ready to run away. (This story was originally narrated by MergaDebelo. The English version was written by Elizabeth Laird.).
author: African Storybook

title: Eneikuna Enkalaoni Pee Eitajeu Enturkuluo
description: Etoyíó enkôp néata enkálaóni enkuré. Nélo olkejú aing'orú enkáré náôk, néya enkáre. Néítajéu entúrkulúo enkalaóni. Káji eikó enkálaóni tenéshukokí entúrkulúo enashê?
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: How Do Seed Travel?    Obumo Bugenda Butye?
description: obumo bugenda butye?
author: Mubbalya Charles

title: Ndayanda Kubala
description: Eeci caano caamba mwanamusankwa uyanda kubala kapati. Ulayanda kuti abalile bamukwasyi wakwe.
author: Vision Milimo

title: Jealous Anansi
description: Anansi's jealousy caused him to remain poor.
author: African Storybook

title: Anansi Et Vautour
description: Anansi est pauvre, mais son ami Lapin est un riche fermier. Anansi est jaloux et trouve un moyen de voler la ferme de son ami. Il gagne beaucoup d'argent en vendant la récolte de Lapin. Mais un jour, il se passe quelque chose qui va faire encore tourner la chance d'Anansi.
author: Hacène Dramchini

title: Monkey and Crocodile
description: Crocodiles are dangerous,  but are they smart?
author: Mozambican folktale

title: Eger Lo Aiunia Imukunyo Akuuri
description: Eonit akwap na kaneni enyamit ikatapan niichi akure. Abu ng'esi toeka nang'olol asakar ng'akipi na kaneni ewokosi ng'esi ng'akipi.Abu Akuuri toyiu akiyar a Ekatapan. Ikokini Ekatapan ebuakini Akuuri alakara ai?
author: Lolupe teachers

title: How I Spend my Time
description: My time
author: Jonathan Erecho

title: Ndikonda Kuwerenga
description: Ndikonda Kuwerenga. Kodi ndizawerengera ndani?
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Paka na Panya
description: Panya mzee mwenye busara anatufundisha kwamba maadui wetu wanapojifanya kuwa marafiki,  ni lazima tuwe tayari kutoroka.
author: Susan Kavaya

title: Uanansi Nenqe
description: Inganekwane okumvelaphi yayo yiseGhana, imayelane nescabucabu kanye nenqe.uAnansi wayeyisicabucabu esimpofu, kodwa umngani wakhe unogwaja wayengumphathi wepulazi elicebile. UAnansi wayenesikhwele, wathola icebo lokuthathela umngani wakhe ipulazi.Wenza imali eningi ethengisa izithelo nezimfino zika nogwaja. Kepha ngelinye ilanga esendleleni ephuma emakethe, kwaba khona okwenzeka okwashintsha inhlanhla yakhe yonke.Lendaba iqukethe incazelo yokuthi okwenzayo kwabanye abantu yikho okuyophinde kubuye
author: Mathlatsi Precious Maleka

title: How Namuhungo Spends Her Day In  Life
description: The story tells you how Tembe spends her day both at school and at home.
author: Mubbalya Charles

title: Ndiwe Ani ?
description: Soma hu bipambaho: Niise ani, biina ebi singa ohwenda era biina ebi panga ohuhola. Ate ewe biina ebihufaho?
author: Rose Alungho

title: Inkawu noXam
description: Ooxam banobungozi,  kodwa ingaba bakrelekrele?
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: Ngala Liche Liaonia Liusiu
description: Eshialo shumire na liche lititi lili nobulo. Litsia mumwalo okhunywa amatsi ne likholomokha na amatsi. Liusiu liwonia liche lititi. Liche Lititi likhupire lirie Liusiu orio?
author: Margaret Amateshe

title: Panya na Paka
description: Panya mwenye hekima anatufunza kwamba adui zako wakijifanya kuwa marafiki zako,  ni lazima utorokee.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Nawudho mu biseera byo bulamu bwe
description: Olufumo lukukobera engeri Taape yaakozesaamu ebiseera eka ni ku isomero.
author: Paul Wambi

title: Tšhošwane e phološa Leeba
description: Naga e omile. Tšhošwane e swerwe ke lenyora. E leba nokeng go yo nwa meetse efela e rwalwa ke meetse. Leeba le ile la phološa bophelo bja Tšhošwane. Na Tšhošwane e tla leboga Leeba bjang?
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Ndiyathanda ukufunda
description: This is a story about a little boy who loves to read stories. He loves it so much so that he wants to share a story with his family.
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: Inkawu noXam (Faka Imibala)
description: Ooxam banobungozi,  kodwa ingaba bakrelekrele?
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: Ipusin Kede Iyoono
description: Oyoo otii ariek pwonyo wa be kame jokwor wa osidiko be kitiye jowotini,  pore ibed di iyikere pi ringo tenge. (Nga itatam me agege obedo Merga Debelo. Ngat owadiko ileb munu obedeo Elizabeth Laird.).
author: Agnes Kabonesa

title: Houses
description: People live in such different kinds of houses all around you. Let's take a look!

title: Iriso ja Mbughimbughi
description: Mbughimbughi iko na iriso ebakiya mkiwa.
author: Clemence Magiri

title: Wankima ne Ggonya
description: Ggonya zabulabe,  naye ekyebuzibwa ngezi?
author: Antony Nsubuga

title: Anansi na Tai
description: Anansi ni maskini,  lakini rafiki yake Sungura ni mkulima tajiri. Anansi ana wivu na anatafuta njia ya kupokonya shamba la rafikiye. Anapata hela nyingi kwa kuuza matunda na mboga ya Sungura. Lakini siku moja alipokuwa njiani akirudi kutoka sokoni,  jambo lilitokea lililobadilisha bahati ya Anansi tena.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: How night came to Opio's village
description: There is no night time in Opio's village. One day he goes hunting and arrives at a place he doesn't know. When night falls there,  Opio thinks he has gone blind. Then he discovers the truth and likes night so much that he takes it to his own village.
author: Robert Ekuka

title: Kokonyana le Leeba
description: Leeba lepolosa kokonyana nokeng. Le kokonyane e polosa leeba.
author: Khothatso Ranoosi

title: Mesi wùn a Ancèkùné
description: Ncèkùn woo ŋgàywìr,  wo dzəə̀n fií,  yéʼey vèsən jii,  ghán se aŋgàa vibàné bóʼti ji á dzə̀ ŋkar sé,  à nèn a dzə̀ kibáʼtín mo a kí kòóy ji à léʼ,  à lèʼ.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: Afghan-Pakistan Borderlands
description: This historical reading describes the Pashtun people of the Afghanistan-Pakistan border region.

title: N'wa Hawu Na N'wa Ngwenya
description: Crocodiles are dangerous, but are they smart?
author: Rafael Ernesto Samuel

title: Ndrí 'ɨ, Òcó 'ɨ Àzɨ́nɨ Tí 'ɨ
description: Ndrí 'ɨ, Òcó 'ɨ àzɨ́nɨ Tí pɨ ndrâ ágyí àzɨ́ àmbó nɨ. Yɨ mu túàlʉ àcìá tákɨ́sɨ̀ sɨ̀, te sâ dèrévà mà séndè òfèzʉ́ rɨ̀ kà ecáa 'boó, yɨ mà àzɨ́ àlʉ nɨ 'ye e'yó àzɨ́ òsʉ̀târʉ́nɨ. E'yó ndê rɨ̀ sɨ̌, yɨ mà àlʉ àlʉ kà mʉ̀tʉ̀kárɨ̀ ndrè 'boó, yɨ mà adrízà nɨ 'ɨ oja ndʉ́ ndʉ́.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Wankembo ni Wangoina
description: Bawangoina ba bulwa,  aye baidhi byebakola?
author: Cornelius Mugulusi

title: Anansi mwenye wivu
description: Wivu wa Anansi ulisababisha abaki maskini.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Kokonyana o pholosa Leeba
description: Naha e omme haholo mme Kokonyana e monyenyane o nyorilwe haholo. O ya nokeng ho ya nwa mme o hoholwa ke metsi. Leeba o pholosa bophelo ba Kokonyana e monyenyane. Ebe Kokonyana e monyenyane o leboha Leeba jwang?
author: Tseliso Masolane

title: Embeba N'ekapa
description: Embeba engesi etwegeresa yiiti omusigu anahwereteresaho otehwa ohuba sitende ohu mudulumaho.
author: Bukheye Mulongo Christopher

title: How the Zebra Got Its Stripes
description: This is an old African Folktale
author: Tia Mullan

title: Ndri, Ocoo Azini Ti
description: Ndrí 'ɨ, Òcó 'ɨ àzɨ́nɨ Tí pɨ ndrâ ágyí àzɨ́ àmbó nɨ. Yɨ mu túàlʉ àcìá tákɨ́sɨ̀ sɨ̀, te sâ dèrévà mà séndè òfèzʉ́ rɨ̀ kà ecáa 'boó, yɨ mà àzɨ́ àlʉ nɨ 'ye e'yó àzɨ́ òsʉ̀târʉ́nɨ. E'yó ndê rɨ̀ sɨ̌, yɨ mà àlʉ àlʉ kà mʉ̀tʉ̀kárɨ̀ ndrè 'boó, yɨ mà adrízà nɨ 'ɨ oja ndʉ́ ndʉ́.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Neema Onthuma Nliinya
description: Follow Nema through the market as she tries to buy some thread.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: اووم ټولګی- فزیک
description: د افغانستان د پوهنی وزارت د نصاب کتابونه

title: Empube ni Kapa
description: A wise old mouse teaches us that when your Empube enkuluwegeresa eti singa abalabebo beefuula okuba mikwanogyo,  olina okuba omwetegefu okulumuka. (This story was originally narrated by MergaDebelo. The English version was written by Elizabeth Laird.).
author: Alice Gonza

title: Hye Ji Ra̱
description: Hyam: Saar ra̱ su di kyaam gya̱ yi hywori nam na̱gha̱ ka̱ kpyeny English: The story is about the function of body parts.
author: Philip Hayab John

title: Taàŋgám wùn K,iluŋŋgùrúʼ kí
description: Taàŋgám dzə̀ ŋgaà kitàn. A ŋkar rə yee Waàŋgáa dzə̀ wir sùm,  a dzə̀ ŋgaà mbàm. Taàŋgám nen lò a siimé súm ŋkar rə,  e nèn a tàʼ dzə́ə yée faàsì. Taàŋgám fiinè vifá ve ví fəə́ fo Waàŋgáa sum,  nèn kérí mbàm sigháʼán. Wáa dzə e kishiíy kímóʼ kí,  kinyo ki koóy wun,  wù nèn siì kfə̀n ji ŋgaà kitàn.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: O Macaco E O Crocodilo
description: Crocodiles are dangerous, but are they smart?
author: Catarina Ribas

title: Tshoswane o thusa Leeba
description: Tshoswane o ne a nyorilwe thata mme a ya kwa nokeng go ya go batla metsi. O ne a tsewa ke metsi. Leeba o ne a thusa go pholosa botshelo jwa gagwe. Tshoswane ena o tla mo thusa ka eng?
author: Lorato Trok

title: Anansi Ne Wampungu
description: Anansi yali mwavu nnyo naye ate nga mukwano gwe Wakayima mulimu wa maanyi. Anansi akwatibwa obuggya era n'asala amagezi okubba ennimiro ya mukwano gwe. Anansi yafuna ssente nnyingi nnyo ng'atunda ebibala n'enva endiriirwa mu katale. Wabula, waliwo ekigwawo Anansi n'afiirwa byonna bye yali afunye.
author: Robert Ssebukyu

title: I know colors
description: I know colors. I know colors. I know colors.
author: Andiswa Magwentshu

title: Kokwani Mone Ipiliselize Liba
description: Mubu uomile. Kakokwani kashwile linyolwa ahulu. Kaya kwakunwa mezi kwa nuka mi bakakukulusa kwa mezi. Liba lapilisa kakokwani. Kucwani kuitumela kwa kaKokwani ku Liba?
author: Limbali Muyendekwa

title: Nelima Agagawala
description: Two young girls go on journeys to find food.  They both meet an old woman on the way, but only one agrees to help her.
author: Salaama Wanale

title: Ng'Achelerwo Ka Ng'Ipakai
description: Araakasi ng'ipakai ka ng'achelerwo ng'ipaalon. Nakaneni tang'ai arai ng'ipaalon lukamodeanak.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: (Colour-in) Monkey and the hunter's wife
description: Colour-in version. All of mother monkey's babies die,  and her sadness grows each day. When she has another baby she is determined that this child will have a better chance.
author: Wesley Kipkorir Rop

title: Nelima atajirika
description: Wasichana wawili wadogo wanakwenda safari ya kutafuta chakula. Wote wanamkuta mwanamke mkongwe njiani,  lakini ni mmoja tu anayekubali kumsaidia.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: ኣንጭዋን ድሙን
description: ሓንቲ ለባም ሽማግለ ኣንጭዋ ፀላኢና ፈታዊ መሲሉ እንትቐርብ፣ ክንርሕቖ ከም ዘለና ኣምሂራትና።
author: Angesom Abadi

title: I know colours
description: A wordless story showing the colours red,  yellow,  blue,  orange,  green and purple.
author: Nina Orange

title: Ibio Pi Roko Be
description: Anansi is poor, but his friend Rabbit is a prosperous farmer. Anansi is jealous, and finds a way to take over his friend's farm. He makes a lot of money selling his friend's fruit and vegetables. But one day on the way home from the market, something happens to change his fortunes again.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Indlela Intfutfwane Leyasindzisa Ngayo Lituba
description: Indzaba lefishane mayelana ne ntfutfwane kanye nelituba,  lendzaba ikhuluma ngekutsi intfutfwane yasindzisa njani lituba.
author: Siphiwe Hlongwane

title: Adurreen Koo Eessa Jirtii?
description: Mucaa adurreen isaa jalaa badde barbaadee argate.
author: Siyane Aniley

title: Ndiyayazi imibala
description: Ndiyayazi imibala. Ndiyayazi imibala. Ndiyayazi imibala.
author: Cynthia Nomhle Ngxukuma

title: Ìbíó Pi Ròkó Be
description: Ìbìó nɨ àlɨ́órʉ te èrɨ mà ágyíi ètóó nɨ ndrá lonyɨ be nɨ̀. Ìbìó nɨ a'á à'yà be rɨ̀ sɨ̌,ndà gèrɨ̀ 'ɨ́ mà ágyíi mà ámvʉ́ pazʉ́. Rɨ séndè esʉ́ ángɨ́rɨ́ patɨ́ àzɨ́nɨ ìrɨ́bɨ́ èrɨ mà àgyíi ètóó nɨ́ rɨ̀ mà ozɨ́zà sɨ̀. Te o'dʉ́ àzɨ́ àlʉ; èrɨnɨ́ engárɨ̀á cûá e'yó àzɨ́ tálɨ́rʉ́ nɨ ‘ye 'ɨ èrɨnɨ́ 'ɨ́ mà lonyɨ esúzʉ́ díká ra.
author: Alice Ojobiru

title: Nema Agula Ulusi
description: Follow Nema through the market as she tries to buy some thread.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Indlela iNtfutfwane lasindzisa ngayo liTuba
description: Kunesomiso intfutfwana yome kakhulu. Iphuma iye emfuleni konatsa emanti,  isanatsa ikhukhulwa ngemanti. Intfutfwane ilibonga kanjani liTuba.
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Oŋer Gi Cipa Jadwar
description: Nyithindhi oŋer je jotho, aka geregere pere omedere kis ndelo. Munyo onywolo nyathi man otemo swa ni nyathi no wobedi gi silwany maber loyo.
author: Owino Ogot

title: Waar is my Kat?
description: My kat het verdwyn.  Ek soek hom oral.
author: Vanessa Rademeyer

title: Lusunzi lu tshidza Tshiivha
description: Shango ḽo oma nahone lusunzi luṱuku lu na ḓora. Lwa ya mulamboni u nwa maḓi lwa kumbiwa. Tshiivha tsha tshidza lusunzi luṱuku.
author: Maphaha Tshimangadzo Nelson

title: Manaasi Ni Ingosya
description: Manaasi ali umutaambi, ne musaale weewe wanduuyu ali umulimi umuyiindifu. Manasi waaba ni likoko, waanyoolayo isaambo iye khukhwiiyisakho khu nimilo y'omusaale weewe. Waatsya waafuna kamapeesa makali naabi nga akulisa tsinyanyi ni bibyaano bya Wanduuyu. Ne shifukhu shitweela nga aama mu khatale akobola ingo, yabawo shishiindu shishashuusakho buulamu bwa Manasi luundi.
author: Fabian Wakholi

title: Monkey's Visit to the Hunter's Home
description: mother monkey used  to get miscarriages whenever she conceived. When she got a baby she is determined that this child will have a better chance.
author: Catherine Nambubi

title: Ndidi langi
description: Emboozi eziraku bibono eraga langi edh'endawulo nga: eyakasaayi,  kyenvu,  bbululu,  kathungwa,  kiragala ni kakobe.
author: Rebecca Ndhibogeza

title: Nema Buys Thread
description: Follow Nema through the market as she tries to buy some thread.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Monkey's child
description: All of mother monkey's babies die,  and her sadness grows each day. When she has another baby she is determined that this child will have a better chance.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: ድመቴ የታለች?
description: ድመቴ ጠፍታብኛለች፡፡ ወደሱ አካባቢ ትታያችኋለች እንዴ? ይህ ተረት በአጫጭር አረፍተ ነገሮች የተዋቀረና ለህጻናት የሚስማማ ተረት ነው፡፡ መልካም ንባብ፡፡
author: Mezemir Girma

title: Ndidhi amaina ga langi
description: Kyenvu,  bbululu,  kathungwa,  kiragala ni nakasooma.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Haŋambi N'esega
description: Haŋambi gaali mutahi aye meriwe Wanduuyu n'ali mulimi era musuni. Ehyo hyaleetera Haŋambi ohugongeera era nga aheja engeri ey'ohwetabata enimiro y'owahye. Ni gayetabata ng'afuna ebbesa enyene enyingi mu hutunda ebibala n'eryani ly'owahye. Coka lwali lulala ni gaali aŋwa mu hatale nga ŋabaŋo ehyagwaŋo nga ebiitu bimucuhaho gagama mu mbeera yiye ekale.
author: Ivan Kaibo

title: Ndlela leyi Risokoti ri nga ponisa Tuva
description: Misava yi omile kasi Xisokotana xi na torha. Xi yile enambyeni ku ya nwa mati ivi xi khukhuriwa xi ya ekule. Tuva ri ponisa vutomi bya Xisokotana. Xana Xisokotana xi khensa Tuva hi ndlela yihi?
author: Mkomati John Mongwe

title: Nema Oothuma Osola
description: Follow Nema through the market as she tries to buy some thread.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: أين قطتي؟
description: My cat has disappeared. Can you see my cat anywhere?
author: Hanadi Traifeh

title: I like to read
description: This is a story about a little boy who loves to read stories. He loves it so much so that he wants to share a story with his family.
author: Letta Machoga

title: Maman Singe Et La Femme Du Chasseur
description: Tous les petits de Maman Singe sont morts, et sa tristesse croît de jour en jour. Lorsqu'elle donne à nouveau naissance à un bébé, elle est déterminée à ce qu'il ait davantage de chance que les précédents.
author: Nathalie Hecker

title: Isabirye ow'eitima
description: Isabirye mwavu,  aye mukwano gwe Kaduuyu mulimi mututumufu. Nabirye wa mwoyo mubi era afuba inho okubona nga anhaga eisamba lya mukwano gwe. Atunda ebibala n'eiva lya Wakaduuyu yaafuna empiiya embitirivu. Lulala yali ava mu kiya nga aja eka,  ekintu kyabaawo ekyacuusa obulamu bwa Isabirye.
author: Alice Gonza

title: Mate Kaŋ Annoori Te Ga Kolŋay Faaba
description: Hayno to, hari ga gaabu. Annoori ma hari jaw gumo. a ka bangu ga ne nga ga hari haŋ, isa bisa nd'a. kala kaŋ kolŋay na a faaba. Mate no a te ga gomno wo bana?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Nema Wagula Usalu
description: Follow Nema through the market as she tries to buy some thread.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Bheka phezulu
description: Leli iculo labantwana lesiZulu elitholakala encwadini ebizwa 'Songs Sung by South African Children' (1990,  1992 and 2002) eshicilelwe ngabakwa Grassroots Adult Education and Training Trust.
author: Liz Brouckaert

title: Anansi E O Abutre
description: Anansi é pobre, mas o seu amigo coelho é um agricultor endinheirado. Anansi tem inveja e arranja uma forma de ficar com a quinta do seu amigo. Faz muito dinheiro a vender as culturas do coelho, mas um dia, algo muda e a sorte de Anansi começa também a mudar.
author: Translators without Borders

title: I love forests
description: In Kibale forest we meet different species of birds,  animals and plants.
author: Gertrude Kobusinge

title: ~Maaŋa La Tu'Usa Pↄga
description: ~Maanya'aŋa wa kↄma la za'a daa ki mε, ti a suure daa kↄ‘ↄm sa'am beere wiiri woo. A san le dↄgε bia a yima a puti'irɛ de la bikaŋa wan nyε zusuŋↄ vo'e.
author: Samuel Awinkene Atintono

title: Mâ Búrãŋâ Íngõlé?
description: Mâ búrãŋâ ãvĩ rá. Índre mâ búrãŋâ ãngũ ãzí gá rá yã?
author: Barnabas Delu

title: Nenda Ohusoma
description: Hanghambagana hu hu soma.
author: Rose Alungho

title: Anansi and wisdom
description: The sky god decides to give Anansi the spider a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world),  the pot falls and breaks.
author: Ghanaian folktale

title: Bi Simu
description: Bi Simu ni mhusika wa kiajabu! Je,  unaweza fikiria kuwa na simu tano za kuwasiliana na watu tofauti?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Umfene Nonkosikazi Womzingeli
description: All of mother monkey's babies die, and her sadness grows each day. When she has another baby she is determined that this child will have a better chance.
author: Zakithi

title: Kiti yangu iripi?
description: Kiti yangu yarasika. Pane arikuonawo here kiti yangu?
author: Ephraim Mhlanga

title: Nkunda Amashyamba
description: Mu ishyamba rya Kibale,  twahasanze inyoni,  inyamaswa n'ibimera by'amoko yose.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: አናንሲና ጥበብ
description: የሰማይ አምላክ ለሸረሪቱ ለአናንሲ አንድ ገንቦ ሙሉ ጥበብ ሊሰጠው ይወስናል፡፡ ሸረሪቱም ገንቦው ውስጥ ያለውን እውቀት ሁሉ አይቶ በጣም ስለተደሰተ እውቀትን ለራሱ ብቻ ለማድረግ በመፈለግ ዛፍ ላይ ሊደብቀው ፈለገ፡፡ የእድል ነገር ሆኖ ገንቦው ይወድቅና ይሰበራል፡፡
author: Mezemir Girma

title: Ng'ai ekebusi kiane kere?
description: Ekebusi kiane kiaborire. Gwakerorire andeonsi?
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: Inkende N'umugore W'umuhigi
description: Abana inkende yabyaraga bose barapfaga,  nuko agahinda kayo kakiyongera buri munsi. Umunsi umwe ibyara undi mwana maze yiyemeza ko uyu mwana atazapfa nk'uko abandi bapfuye.
author: Martin Arabaruta

title: Ng'Idison Lu Ka Ata
description: The little girl is curious as she watches her grandma preparing to ripen bananas.  Where grandma stores the bananas to ripen remains top secret to the disappointment of her grandchild. But how long does it take before the grandchild discovers grandma's secret?
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: What Is the US Capitol Building?
Nnendha ebibira
description: Mu kibira ekye Kibale twagaana mu ebinhonhi,  ensolo n'ebirime eby'endhawulo.
author: Alice Gonza

title: Nya Simu
description: Nya Simu oyido dhano gi pi! Apar ye bedo gi simu abic ma luwo gi ji m'opokere opokere?
author: Owino Ogot

title: Where is my cat?
description: My cat has disappeared. Can you see my cat anywhere?
author: Clare Verbeek

title: Built, Burned, Bakery: A Short History of the US Capitol Building
أنانسي و الحكمة
description: في قديم الزمان، كان الناس لا يعرفون شيئا. كانوا لا يعرفون طريقة زراعة المحاصيل، أو نسج الأقمشة، أو صناعة الأدوات الحديدية. كان هناك الإله نيام في السماء وكان يملك كل الحكمة الموجودة في العالم. وكان محتفظا بها في وعاء من الفخار
author: Abrar Wafa

title: Ms Phone
description: Ms Phone is quite a character! Can you imagine having five phones,  for communicating with different people?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Mwana wa Tumbili (Colour-in)
description: Tumbili anaamua kumweka mwanawe njiani ili abarikiwe na wapita njia akitumaini kuwa hatampoteza tena kama alivyokuwa akiwapoteza wengine.
author: Baraka Fatma

title: Ngewe n'umuryango wange
description: Iyi ni inkuru y'umwana muto w'umuhungu wishoraga ahantu hose,  kandi akagira umuryango udasanzwe.
author: Epimaque Niyibizi

title: Ngonza Ebibira
description: Kubunga mu ekibira kya Kibale kikaleta kumanya bingi hali ebisoro, ebinyoni, hamu nebimera.
author: Gertrude Kobusinge

title: Ukuphi ukatsu wami?
description: Ukatsu wami unyamalele. Ngabe awukamboni na?
author: Khanyisile Mtungwa

title: Anansi Keda Acoa
description: Obu akuju ideke oseku ainakin Anansi Asimokoki amot na acoa. Iyalama do anu ajenun kere kotoma aite ke ekot aibwa ne stoma Okitoi tetere erai ngesi bon ecoo. Nu arokok anuke (konye ejokaka anu itunga kere ka akwap),  obu amot odou osodi abwang.
author: Betty Atima

title: I love my father
description: My father is my best friend at home,  He is always ready to listen when I have a problem.
author: Namusisi Vicky Kirabo

title: Mme Téléphone !
description: Mme Phone est un sacré personnage ! Pouvez-vous vous imaginer posséder cinq téléphones pour communiquer avec différentes personnes ?
author: Véronique Haour

title: Mtoto wa Kima (Colour -In)
description: Watoto wote wa mama kima wanafariki na huzuni wake unazidi kuwa mkubwa. Anapomzaa mtoto mwingine,  anaamua kwamba mtoto huyo atapata nafasi ya kuishi.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Ngingakwenza lokhu
description: Lencwadi yemifanekiso ichaza ngezinto esifunda ukuzenza uma sisakhula.
author: Clare Verbeek

title: Wat kan ek doen?
description: Ek kan baie verskillende dinge doen.
author: Robyn Vorster

title: Anansi Keda Acoa
description: The sky god decides to give Anansi the spider a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world),  the pot falls and breaks.
author: Betty Atima

title: Mwana wa Tumbili
description: Tumbili anaamua kumweka mwanawe njiani ili abarikiwe na wapita njia akitumaini kuwa hatampoteza tena kama alivyokuwa akiwapoteza wengine.
author: Baraka Fatma

title: Iphi ikati yam?
description: I cannot find my cat. Please help me look for him.
author: Lunathi Ntunzi

title: Ngonza Bbaabba ghange
description: Bbaabba ni mukagwa ghange asinga eka,  awulirisa buli bwemba ndikuloodheraku ku bizibu byange.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Nyiramaterefone
description: Nyiramaterefone aratangaje cyane. Ibaze nawe umuntu ufite telefone eshanu zo kuganiriraho n'abantu batandukanye?
author: Sylvestre Ntabajyana

title: Anansi N'obong'aini
description: The sky god decides to give Anansi the spider a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world),  the pot falls and breaks.
author: Dennis Ogaro Ondieki

title: I Love Reading
description: This is a story about a little boy who loves to read stories. He loves it so much so that he wants to share a story with his family.
author: Rose Alungho

title: Mbaka yakwa ĩva?
description: Mbaka yakwa nĩyaie. Nũtonya kwĩthĩwa ũũmyona vandũ?
author: Anna Kula

title: Inhe masimu
description: Inhe masimu muzaanhi! Osobola okufumimtiriza ku kyo okuba na amasimu ataanu,  nga ga kughulizagania na bantu bandhawulo?
author: Enocha Tasingika

title: Mtoto wa Kima
description: Watoto wote wa mama kima wanafariki na huzuni wake unazidi kuwa mkubwa. Anapomzaa mtoto mwingine,  anaamua kwamba mtoto huyo atapata nafasi ya kuishi.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Ngithanda ukufunda
description: Le yindatjana emayelana nomsanyana othanda ukufunda iindatjana. Uzithanda khulu ngalendlela yokobana ufuna ukwabelana ngendatjana nomndeni wakhe.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Wapi paka wangu?
description: Paka wangu ametokomea. Unaweza kumwona paka wangu popote?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Ananzi Na Ũĩ
description: The sky god decides to  give Anansi the spider  a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world), the pot falls and breaks.
author: Anna Kula

title: Menina Telefone
description: A Menina Telefone é cá uma figura! Consegues imaginar o que é ter cinco telefones, para comunicar com pessoas diferentes?
author: Translators without Borders

title: Engende ne muka muhighi
description: Abana abosi aba engende baka holha,  ne obulighe bwiwe buka kulha bulikiro.
author: Denise Rwabwera

title: I Love to Read
description: This is a story about a little boy who loves to read stories. He loves it so much so that he wants to share a story with his family.
author: Letta Machoga

title: Ngithanda ukufunda
description: Umsanyana omncani uthanda ukufunda khulu,  nje ufuna ukufunda kanye nomndeni wakhe.
author: William Jiyana

title: Wapi niawu na ngai
description: Niawu na nga abungi. Okoki komonela ngai ye wapi?
author: Dorine Kamin

title: Anansi awapa watu hekima
description: Mungu wa angani anaamua kumpa Buibui Anansi chungu cha hekima. Anasisimka sana kutokana na aliyojifunza mpaka anataka kukificha chungu hicho mtini ili afaidike peke yake. Kwa bahati mbaya,  (lakini bahati nzuri kwa walimwengu),  chungu kinaanguka na kuvunjika.
author: Mutugi Kamundi

title: Mma Mogala
description: Padi ka ga mosadi yo o nang le megala e metlhano.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Ekima N'Omuhasi W'Omuŋiimi
description: Mama we'kima gafirwanaga abaana,  ganakuwalanga buli obuhyeye,  ni gafuna omwana obundi gatehwa ohubona nti ahula.
author: Beatres Nabune

title: I Neno Aŋo?
description: Kitabo ma cal.
author: Owino Ogot

title: Ngiyakutsandza kufundza
description: Lendzaba imayelana nemfana lomncane lotsandza kufundza tindzaba. Utsandza kakhulu ngendlela yekutsi ufuna kucocela umndeni wakhe lenye yetindzaba latifundzile.
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: How Laws Are Made in the US
Ngiyathanda ukufunda
description: Lendaba ikhuluma ngengane ethanda ukufunda izincwadi,  kodwa abantu abanasikhathi sokumlalela ngenxa yemisebenzi ethile abayenzayo. Ekugcineni ugcina ezifundela yena.
author: Cynthia Nxele

title: Bibyaano
description: In a faraway village, there was a very beautiful girl whom everyone wished to marry. It was difficult for the parents to decide on a right suitor for their daughter. However, in their compound, they also had a very sweet fruit. They decided that their daughter would be given to whoever visited them and stayed the whole day without eating any of the fruit. Many young men came to their home to try to win the young, beautiful girl for themselves. Who overcame the test to win the young girl's hand in marriage?
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Eepuusi yaange eliwaae?
description: Eepuusi yaange yaatibile. Wamboonelekho eepusi yaange oosi oosi?
author: Raphael Wanyonyi

title: Wankembo  ni mukazi w'omuyiizi
description: Enkembo dhonadhona edhizaala abaana dhifa,  era enaku emweyongera buli luca. Bwaba n'omwana owundi,  yaaba n'obuvumu ati omwana ono aidha kuba n'obulamu.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Owona Hiina?
description: Hanghamba hu bitu ebyenjawulo
author: Rose Alungho

title: Ibio Pi Ondoa Be
description: The sky god decides to  give Anansi the spider  a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world), the pot falls and breaks.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Wankembo,ni muk'omuyiizi
description: Siiga lanji mubifaanani. Abaana bonaboona, bafa era obweinamivu bwe,  bwenda kumwita bu olukya. Buli lw'aomwana owundi,  Asuubira nti ob'olygho,  ono anakula.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Kkapa Yange Eri Wa?
description: Kkapa yange embuzeeko. Olina w'olabye kkapa yange?
author: Robert Ssebukyu

title: Èbìó Pɨ Òndʉ̀á Be
description: Mungu wa angani anaamua kumpa Buibui Anansi chungu cha hekima. Anasisimka sana kutoka na yale anajifunza kiasi cha kutaka kukificha chungu hicho mtini ili afaidike pekee yake.  Kwa bahati mbaya, (lakini bahati nzuri kwa walimwengu), chungu kinaanguka na kuvunjika.
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Ngonza bugonze
description: Omwana ono mukalamu inho. Agonza ki? Kutyama? Kuzaanha? Kulya? Oba Kosoma?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Fruit
description: There was a beautiful girl whom everyone wished to marry. In her family compound, there was a tree with delicious fruit. Her parents decided that their daughter would marry whoever visited them and stayed the whole day without eating any of the fruit.  Who would pass the test to win the girl's hand in marriage?
author: Shakira Bodio

title: I plan to be a king
description: It is about someone dreaming about being a king and the life that comes with it.
author: Katusiime Gift

title: Les Fruits
description: Il était une fois une très jolie jeune fille que tous les hommes voulaient épouser. Dans la concession de sa famille poussait un arbre aux fruits délicieux. Ses parents décidèrent que leur fille se marierait au premier visiteur qui réussirait à rester chez eux toute une journée sans manger de fruit.
author: Nathalie Hecker

title: Ma Vile Busua Ngua Ya?
description: My cat has disappeared. Please help me find him.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Manaasi Ni Kamakhula
description: Wele we likulu akhalawo khuukabila Manasi Nabubi inyuungu iyetsulamo kamakhula. Aryo waasangaala naabi lweebyo byeesi eyika nga waakilolilemo, nashiryo waakana akibise khu kusaala, nio kane kakeewe yenyene. Ne she khabi imbi khu lweewe, ne shiilayi isi babaandu babaandi be mu shibala, inyuungu yaakwa aasi yaatikhaka
author: Fabian Wakholi

title: Nnhenda Bwende
description: Omwana ono mulungi. Ayenda ki? Kutyama? Kuzaanha? Kulya? Oba kusoma?
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Nteekateeka  okuba  Kyabazinga
description: Olufumo luno lugema ku muntu alikuloota okuba Kyabazinga era n'obulamu obunairirira nga afuuse kyabazinga.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Omwana Wa Lishene
description: Abaana ba lishene bafwa boosi  ne litirwa nende shibeera eshikali. Olwa liebula omwana undi, likhalaka liparo mbu khatimba omwana walio aone.
author: Margaret Amateshe

title: Tiisi Wɔla
description: Pugela kayima n daa boi, kɔ'ɔm sum ti budaa woo kɔ'ɔm bɔta ka ti ka di. Pugela wa me yire daa tari tiisi n kɔ'ɔm ŋwana disuma. Pugela wa dɔgereba daa nyaa ku nuurɛ ti bama bia wa wan ele la budamina n nyaŋɛ wa'am ba yire la na zi'ire ta ma'ɛ yinɛ gee ka makɛ kalum tiisi wɔla wa.
author: Samuel Awinkene Atintono

title: Umugore wumuhigi N'ikyende
description: Abana banyina wikyende bose baranfaga,  agahinda kakarushaho kumwiyongera. Iyo yabyaye umwana,  atekyerezagako aribugire amahirwe.
author: Kagame Bruce

title: Má Vɨ́lé Búsùá Ngʉ̀á Yǎ?
description: Má vɨ́lé búsùá  àvɨ̀ rá. Mɨ́ ecó mánɨ́ má vɨ́lé búsùá ně pàrɨ àzɨ́á rá rô?
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Nambumbi kalimagezi
description: Katonda wo mwigulu yasalagho okugha Nambumbi ensuwa y'amagezi. Mukyamukirivu inho nabuli kintu kyasoma nga agirinzeemu nti era ayendha kugikweka mumuti asobole okugyesigaliza mwene yenka. Ekyembi eino kumwene [aye nga kirungi kubantu abandi],  ensugha kugwa yaameneka.
author: Isaac Mapiti

title: Ngonza bugonze
description: Omwana ono mulungi. Ayenda ki? Kutyama? Kuzaanha? Kulya? Oba kusoma?
author: David  Bamukangwiire

title: Ninyenda okuba omugabe
description: Nikikwata aha mutu ori kutekateka aha kuba omugabe no'ku arayetwaze.
author: Katusiime Gift

title: Ngwana Wa Sejato
description: Kanegelo ka mosetsanyana wa sejato. O a itshola morago ga go ja kudu.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Anansi Ó Eng'énó
description: Nényorráa enkaí aishó Anansi emotí é eng'énó. Néshipa naléng, nélo aík ínâ motí te olcháni peê eakú ninyé aké nátum ínâ ng'énó. Káke etusulúnye iná móti nébela. Nétum iltung'aná póoki eng'éno.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Ekapa Yange Yiri Ŋeena?
description: Ekapa eyaali netabuneha, ni bayendula.
author: Gershom Hirome

title: I Suɔ  Ma Kane Ni
description: Nyazia nɛ ɔ kɔɔ nyumu yo wayo ko nɛ suɔ nyazia kanemi he. E suɔ waa nitsɛ nɛ emaa suɔ nɛ e sia nyazia ha e webimɛ.
author: Divine Apedo (OLE Ghana)

title: Tshwene Le Mosadi Wa Motsomi
description: All of mother monkey's babies die, and her sadness grows each day. When she has another baby she is determined that this child will have a better chance. Bana ba ga tshwene ba botlhe ba a swa. Kutlo-botlhoko ya gagwe e gola letsa le letsatsi.
author: Monica Mashia

title: Imbuto
description: Habayeho umukobwa wari mwiza cyane ku buryo abasore base bashakaga ko ababera umugore. Mu isambu y'iwabo hameze igiti cy'imbuto ziryoshye cyane. Ababyeyi be biyemeza kuzamushyingira umusore uzashobora kubasura akamara umunsi wose atariye ku mbuto z'icyo giti.
author: Janviere Micomyiza

title: Tshwene Le Mosadi Wa Motsumi
description: Mosadi wa motsumi yo o molemo.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Anansi Ka Aosou
description: Abu akuj na alokidiama todung ainakin asimokok Anansi amot nalupe na aosou.Alakara ng'esi noi kang'una kadaang ana abu ng'esi toyen sodi tani tasak akidaikin  amot nalupe ng'ina kidiama ekitoi toliworor akeng bon. A echeny alokarunon anikeng tarai echeny ajokon alotung'a akwapit, abu amot nalupe ng'ina tochakun alokitoe nabo tobwangae.
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Matunda
description: Alikuwa msichana mrembo sana aliyevutia posa za wanaume wengi. Nyumbani kwao mti wenye matunda matamu sana ulikuwepo. Wazazi wake msichana walikata shauri ya kuwa watamkubali kumwoa binti yao mtu ambaye katika matembezi yake kwao angekaa siku nzima bila ya kula tunda lolote la mti huo. Je,  nani atashinda mtihani wa kumwoa msichana?
author: Translators without Borders

title: Eipuusi Lyange Lili Igha?
description: Eipuusi lyange libuze. Bambi nnhamba okulinoonhya.
author: James Kidulu

title: Ibhola lami elibomvu
description: Ibhola elikhulu elibomvu lithatha uhambo.
author: Margaret Nokuthula Zondi

title: Ngwana Wa Sejato!
description: Kanegelo ka mosetsanyana wa sejato. O a itshola morago ga go ja kudu.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: (Colour-in) Monkey eats his own tail
description: That rabbit is at it again!
author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Anansi Nende Obuchesi
description: Nyasaye welikulu ayeresia Anansi olububi inyungu yo obuchesi. Yasangala muno khu amayiakha kayekanga buli leyalinganganga mwo , kho yapara mbu yachikhe inyungu eyo ekulu womusala kho ibe eyie yenyene. khu olwa ikhabi yaye imbi  (na khu olwa ikhabi indayi ye abandu bo khushialo) inyungu yakwa niyatikha.
author: Catherine Were

title: Ibhola yam ebomvu
description: Ibhola enkulu ebomvu ithabatha uhambo.
author: Kholeka Mabeta

title: Kapa yange erigha?
description: Kapa yange ebuze. Munhambe okuginooniaku.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Lisubil
description: Usapuan nyanyaan uba le nan bi le unii mɔmɔk nan ban u mɔn u. Waa maal aachenl ni, busub biba le nan bi ki kpa ŋisubil mu mɔ sakpen na. Ute ni una nan chuu ke bi bisal ga mɔn unii u mɔk ga manl bi nwiin mɔn aan kaa ŋmɔ ŋisubil gbaan na.
author: Kunji Daniel Mbedobe

title: Ngwana watšhiwana
description: Ngwana o hlakisa ko rakgadi wa gagwe.
author: Ephasia Ramohlale

title: Aluwae Eyei Ipus Nikang'?
description: Ayaka ipus kang . Nying'olikina iyong' ipus kang' awadio a?
author: Telly Emekwi

title: Ibhola yam ebomvu
description: Ibhola e nkulu eBomvu ithabatha uhambo.
author: Andiswa Magwentshu

title: Anansi Nende Obuchesi
description: The sky god decides to give Anansi the spider a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world), the pot falls and breaks.
author: Catherine Were

title: Monkey eats his own tail
description: That rabbit is at it again!
author: Mozambican folktale

title: Nhenda okusoma
description: Eno ne emboozi eyo omusulube ayenda okusoma ebyafaayo. Akyenda inho nti ayenda okughayiraku abomundhu ye.
author: Juliet Namugaya

title: Pati Efi
description: In one of a faraway village, there was a very beautiful girl whom everyone wished to marry. It was difficult for the parents to decide on a right suitor for their daughter. However, in their compound they also had a very sweet fruit. They, therefore, decided that their daughter would be given to whoever visited them and stayed the whole day without eating any of the fruit.
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Anansi Y La Sabiduría
description: The sky god decides to give Anansi the spider a pot of wisdom. He is so excited by all he learns from looking into it that he wants to hide it in a tree so that he can keep it all to himself. Unfortunately for him (but fortunately for the people of the world), the pot falls and breaks.
author: Felipe Bañados Schwerter

title: اووم ټولګی- حرفه
description: د افغانستان د پوهنی وزارت د نصاب کتابونه

title: Ibholo yami ebovu
description: Ibholo ekulu ebovu ithatha ikhambo elide.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Le singe lui mange la queue
description: Cet lapin l'est a aussi! le lapin intelligente est bon ami a le singe mais ils sont devenus des adversaires.
author: Sibella  Muheki

title: Ipusi yanje iri yena?
description: Ipusi yanje ikhamire. Oyilutsikho abundu wosi wosi?
author: Peter Wanga

title: Ni Da Iyalina
description: Tarifin wani yaro da ƴan uwanshi da ba su saba ba.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Patí Éfɨ́
description: Zámvá àzɨ́ ndrìzàrʉ́ nɨ ndrâ cɨ́ 'bá drɨ́á nɨ́ lě jé òkʉ́ rʉ nɨ. Yɨ vɨ́lé  àkú drìá, patí àzɨ́ éfɨ́ be aluzàrʉ́ nɨ ndrâ cɨ́. Èrɨ mà tipíka ngá ti ecɨ́ kɨ́nɨ̀ yɨ mà zî nɨ ngǎ 'ba cɨ́ emúpɨ yɨ vɨ́lé àkúá, a'api ètú zù patí 'da ma éfɨ́ àlʉ nɨ 'bìkókòrʉ́ rɨ̀ 'du ágúpîrʉ́ 'i. À'dɨ nɨ te ngǎ obétá 'dɨ̀ aga zámvá 'dɨ̀ 'dɨ̀ 'duzʉ́ òkʉ̂ rʉ́ nɨ̀?
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Anansi Ó Olóíkúmá
description: Meyíéú Anansi néng'arie olchoré lenyé olóíkúmá endáa nanyáíta. Néesêk. Néítokí siî nínye oloikumá aitoomón Anansi enkají enyé. Néesêk siî ninyé énaa enaitaásakí. Németikí ényâ ínâ dáa.
author: Paul Maseri

title: Ni Da Iyalina
description: Tarifin wani yaro da ƴan uwanshi da ba su saba ba.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Bibyaano
description: There was a beautiful girl whom everyone wished to marry. In her family compound, there was a tree with delicious fruit. Her parents decided that their daughter would marry whoever visited them and stayed the whole day without eating any of the fruit.  Who would overcame the test to win the girl's hand in marriage?
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Ibiri
description: Sentensi enhangu ku bintu ebibiri ebikolaganira aghalala nga amakono,  ebigere,  amatu,  amaiso,  n'amakono.
author: Joseph  Mukwaya

title: Onde Está O Meu Gato?
description: O meu gato desapareceu. Consegue ver o meu gato em algum lado?
author: Translators without Borders

title: Inkawu itya umsila wayo
description: Umvundla uqalile ngamaqhinga!
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: اثنان
description: أجزاء من الجسم
author: المفكرون الصغار

title: Miite Ani Pisimwani?
description: My cat has disappeared. Please help me find him.
author: Joyce Chemitai

title: Anansi Et Tortue
description: Anansi ne veut pas partager ses délicieux ignames avec son ami, Tortue, et le persuade de ne pas en manger. Aussi quand Tortue invite Anansi à diner dans sa maison sous l'eau, Tortue fait en sorte qu'Anansi ne profite pas non plus de la nourriture.
author: Boulanger Mirei

title: Ehibala
description: Mu hirala hu byalo ebyali eyo, yaliyo omuhaana omuŋoono oyu hiisi muutu gegomba ahwe. Hyali higosi abasaaye ohusalaŋo omuutu omutuufu oyu banaŋe omuhaana waawe. Ne mu lunya lwawe mwalimo omusaala gw'ebibala ebinyunyula obugali. Kale nga basalaŋo baati omusaaja alibahyalira n'ajiiye ohuhobya omuhaana gahena olunaku lwosi n'ataliiyeho hu hibala nj'oyu balifugiirira ohuhwa omuhaana waawe.
author: Ivan Kaibo

title: Nikonda Kuwelenga
description: Iyi ninkani ya munyamata wamene akonda kuwelenga tuntano. Akondesesa kuwelenga ndipo amafuna muntu owelengela mu banja lake.
author: Bether Mwale Moyo

title: Inkawu itya umsila wayo (Faka imibala)
description: Umvundla uqalile ngamaqhinga!
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: Two
description: Simple sentences about things in pairs or twos - hands, feet, ears, eyes and arms.
author: Carole Bloch

title: Katse yaka e kae?
description: Ke padiso ka katse yeo mong wa yona a be a sa tsebe gore e ko kae. O ile a e nyaka gohle a sa tsebe gore e ko kae.
author: Letta Machoga

title: Ekibala Ekiwomu
description: Ghali yo omughala omulungi nga buli muntu yegomba ku muwasa. Mu luya lwa maka gaibwe,  waliyo omuti nga gulina ebibala ebirungi nga biwooma. Abazaire be basalawo nga omwana ghaibwe alina okufumbirwa oyo eyali nga yabakyaliraku era nga yasibawo olunaku lwonalwona naire okulya ku kibala kyonakyona. Anabita ekigezo okuwangula omukono gw'omwana mu bufumbo?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Nikunda kushoma
description: Omwonjo olikukunda kushoma munonga kandi nayenda kushomera abanyabuzale be konka bona bine ebibalonyonibakola kandi nomwana abyami.
author: Nikirungi Belinda

title: U Anansi No Fudu
description: Anansi has prepared sweet potatoes for his supper, but when his friend Turtle asks him to share his food with him, he plays a trick on Turtle. Read this story to see what Turtle does when he invites Anansi to his home for a meal.
author: Kerry Heath

title: Wankima alya omukira gwe
description: That rabbit is at it again! This is a folktale from Mozambique,  but it probably has correlates elsewhere.
author: Samson  Nabbimba

title: Kocie przytulanki w mieście
description: Poznaj Julkę, która przytuliła prawie wszystkie koty w mieście!

title: Birds around Me
description: The story is about common birds around our home which are easy to watch.

title: Los hermanos Ayar
description: Cuatro hermanos salen en búsqueda de buenas tierras para la fundación del Imperio Inca.

title: Où est passée Rainette ?
description: Dina recherche partout son amie Rainette. Peux-tu l’aider à la trouver ?

title: Happy And The Stolen Cookie
description: This story is about a little dog named Happy who makes a journey to eat a cookie.

title: Wankima alya omukira gwe
description: That rabbit is at it again! This version with black-and-white illustrations can be used for colouring in.
author: Samson  Nabbimba

title: Anansi Na Nguu
description: Anansi has prepared sweet potatoes for his supper, but when his friend Turtle asks him to share his food with him, he plays a trick on Turtle. Read this story to see what Turtle does when he invites Anansi to his home for a meal.
author: Stephen Musyoka

title: Katse ya ka e kae?
description: Katse ya ka e timetše. Na go na le mo o e bonago?
author: Thelma Tshesane

title: Ekibala Ekiwoomu
description: Ghali yo omughala omulungi nga buli muntu yegomba ku muwasa. Mu luya lwa amaka gaibwe,  waliyo omuti nga guliku ebibala ebirungi ebiwooma. Abazaire be baasalawo nga omwana ghaibwe ali n'okufumbirwa omuntu nga abakyalira yasiibawo olunaku lwonalwona ayenga naire okulya ku kibala kyonakyona. Anaabita ekigezo ekyo nga naamughangula mu bufumbo?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Ninapenda Kusoma
description: Mtoto anajitahidi sana kumpata mtu wa kumsomea.
author: Pete Mhunzi

title: Igĩrĩ
description: Gũtunga kũhũthũ igũrũ rĩa indo ĩgĩrĩ kana mahatha.
author: Lilian Wachira

title: Wankima alya omukira gwe
description: Tutunulidde olugero olulala wakaima wayolesa amagezige nga Wankima yali yefudde mugezi naye wakaima namusinza amagezi.
author: Berkit Cizellah Desire

title: Anansi na Kasa
description: Anansi hataki kula viazi vikuu vitamu na rafikiye Kasa na anamfanyia hila ili asipate sehemu yoyote. Kwa hivyo,  Kasa anapomwalika Anansi nyumbani kwake kwenye maji maji kwa chakula cha jioni,  anahakikisha kuwa Anansi vilevile hafurahii chakula chochote.
author: Mutugi Kamundi

title: Katse ya me e kae?
description: Katse ya me e timetse. Nthuseng go e batla.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Ekijuma
description: Hakaba haroho omwisiki murungi buli omu owuyagonzaaga kuswera. Omuzigati yabo, hakaba harumu omuti gwebijuma ebirukunura. Bazairebe bakacwamu ngu muhara wabu aliswerwa buli alibabungira ekiro kyona atalire kijuma kyona.
author: Kangume Rhodah

title: Mbili
description: Mitungo miepesi kuhusu vitu viwili au jozi – viganja,  miguu,  masikio,  macho,  mikono.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Ninapenda Kusoma
description: Mtoto anajitahidi sana kumpata mtu wa kumsomea.
author: Pete Mhunzi

title: Sitselo
description: Bekunentfombatane lenhle nanoma ngubani bekafisa kuyishada. Emndenini wakubo bekunesihlahla sesitselo lesimnandzi. Batali balentfombatane bancuma kutsi indvodzakati yabo itawushada nanoma ngabe ngubani lotabavakashela ahlale nabo lilanga lonkhe angadli nasinye saletitselo.
author: Nobuhle Nkosi

title: 街上的顏色
description: 街道上有很多有趣的事物。 一起和Sonu，Monu和Rina 沿著的多姿多彩的道路走走吧。

title: Pohon Palem
description: Apakah kamu tahu betapa bermanfaatnya pohon palem? Baca dan cari tahu!

title: My gemeenskap
description: Die Mamma en die kind koop kos by die stalletjies in die gemeenskap

title: Le fantastiche ricette di Ammachi
description: Sooraj prepara un buonissimo barfi al cocco con la nonna.

title: La Musica ai Piedi della Collina
description: Gli animali ascoltano la musica e cercano di scoprire cosa sia

title: Katse ya me e kae?
description: Katse ya me e nyeletse. A o kgona go bona katse ya me gongwe?
author: Lorato Trok

title: Enkiima eliile omukiira gwaa yo
description: Tikiisaa okweesiga omuntu gwo yagiire kubanga asoboola okusuula omukaatego.
author: Racheal Kadondi

title: Taàŋgám wùn Kibóŋaàrí keé ndzəv kí
description: Taàŋgám wo á kfə̀n lo á wàa yòŋ yír rə́ yímóʼó ji Anansi dzə̀,  a wù yòʼ-oò ló a kòŋ ji ŋkar rə yee Kibóŋaàrí keé ndzəv,  yútí ́ á réʼ rə́. Réʼ rə́ a yì-iì rəʼtìn feyì. Wù nen kù a bìnèr wun bínerin fo wù kum réʼ yee shooy e shuù,  fə̀m à shishàr sho. Á bèy,  Kibóŋaàrí kí bí sá Taàŋgám (Anansi) ji wù yii wù wìy á fo ŋkǎʼ viyikìr e wun laʼ ye yí dzəə̀n é mvə̀m ndzə̀v. Kibóŋaàrí kí dú ewày sá wayín ji bó Taàŋgam yòʼ yíi yutí a sa kifá kfə́,  fə̀m à shishàr sho.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: Ng'arei
description: Atong'un eger loebeben ngiborei ng'iarei kori luikwaan.
author: Telly Emekwi

title: Ninkunda okushoma
description: Ekyinekyitebyo ahari omwojo muto orikukunda kushoma ebitebyo. Nakukunda munonga hati nayenda kutebeza na nekaye.
author: Shiba Atukunda

title: Biʼ
description: Màmé yòʼ dzə̀,  bàá nèn a teè bíʼ yee kijàvndzə.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: Anansi Ne Wanfudu
description: Anansi tayagala kuwa mukwano gwe Wanfudu ku mayuuni ge agawooma ennyo era amasalira amagezi okulaba nga tagalyako. Kale nno ne Wanfude bw'ayita Anansi okulya ekyeggulo mu maka ge agali mu mazzi, Wanfudu afuba okulaba nti Anansi talya ku mmere era nga Anansi bwe yamukola.
author: Joseph M. Katabaro

title: Icimbi elicwebezelayo
description: Lendaba imayelana necimbi ikasilika. Isitshela ngezinto ezenziwa yile cimbi nokuthi liphenduka kanjani libe yinto ehlukile.
author: Clare Verbeek

title: Wankembo alya omukira gwe
description: Wakayima ono kabiri aize ni mu kazaanho kano.
author: Charles Eramaga

title: Liphi Likati Lami
description: My cat has disappeared. Can you see my cat anywhere?
author: Gabsile Precious Shongwe

title: Nitumie nini kusafiri?
description: Mtoto anawaza juu ya kusafiri na anajiuliza ni chombo kipi mwafaka na salama cha kusafiria.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Niyigaba Wamanzi
description: Umugani wumusore bita Niyigaba,  wasize batobe nanyina akaja kwigira imahanga.
author: Kagame Bruce

title: Bifaananie by'obulabe
description: Bino n'ebifaanani ebiraga obulabe obutuuka ku muntu nga abikozeiza obubi.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Ebio Pi Okukua Be
description: Anansi has prepared sweet potatoes for his supper, but when his friend Turtle asks him to share his food with him, he plays a trick on Turtle. Read this story to see what Turtle does when he invites Anansi to his home for a meal.
author: Saidi Omar Dramani

title: Tshimange tshanga tshi ngafhi?
description: Tshimange tshanga tsho ngalangala. No vhuya na tshi vhona-vho?
author: Ndivhuho Mutsila

title: Ekadokot Lo Anyami Ekosim Keng.
description: Poya kidiama eboyor Ekadokot alobang ka Apoo nakooson
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Icoot
description: The story is about a clever hare that tricked two fat animals in a tug of war.
author: Janelle Martin

title: Nja gala nyo okusooma
description: Luno olugelo dwogela ku mulenzi omutto ayagala okusooma engeelo. Alwagala nyo okutuuka okwaagala oku gabana olugeelo ne famile ye.
author: Sabra Mulungi

title: Ànɨ́kánɨ̀kà Pɨ Òkùkù Be
description: Ànìkáníka lènɨ́ 'ɨ́ vílé áyʉ́ aluzàrɨ̀ nyá 'ɨ́mà ágyíi òkùkù be kʉ, nga dɨ́ èrɨ olé èrɨnɨ́ ànɨ́ ecózʉ́ esúzʉ́ kʉ be nì. Òkùkù nɨ́ èri omverɨ́a ɨ́ vʉ àkú yí rʉrɨ ma alɨ́a, nè kílílírʉ kínì ànìkáníka nyanɨ́ vɨ́nɨ  ɨ́ vʉ nyaká aluzà rɨ̀ kʉ ìndì.
author: Alice Ojobiru

title: Wīn Qaṭṭūsti?
description: Qaṭṭūsti rāħet. Tnajjamci talqa qaŧŧūsti fi baɛđ̣ l-boqɛa?
author: Ramzi Hachani

title: O Macaco Que Comeu a Sua Própria Cauda
description: That rabbit is at it again!
author: Jorge Eusébio Eusébio

title: Dangerous Objects
description: Pictures of dangerous objects.
author: Awua Gasper

title: Icoot
description: The story is about a clever hare that tricked two fat animals in a tug of war.
author: John Emongot

title: Wanasi Ni Wanakhutu
description: Wanaasi s'akana khuukabanana n'umusaale weewe Wanakhutu tsimbama tseewe tsitsin'gaaha ta, kila amukhalila kamakyesi khuumukhaasisa. Lutweela nga Wanakhutu naye waamulaangile khukhwiitsa khuumukyeeniyilakho khu she angoloobe muungo mweewe mwe mu meetsi, naye waakhalawo khuubona ari Wanaasi naye s'akhoombakho khu bilyo byeewe ta.
author: Milton Eridad Shissa

title: Níbo Ni Ológbò Mi Wà?
description: Ológbò mi ti sọnù. Ṣé ẹ bá mi rí i níbìkíbi?
author: Morayo Akinkugbe

title: Ebifaananie  eby'obulabe
description: Ebifaananie ebireeta obulabe ku bantu ni kubintu eby'endhawulo.
author: Julius Bamwagala

title: Nja kukulya
description: Lwali olwo baayagaanana. Eyasinga tiyagirya.
author: Inhebantu Alice-Muloki Memorial Library

title: Enkyende erire omukira gwayo
description: Egyo wakame ya garukaho ogundi murundi! Oku wakame yarebize munywani wayo enkyende bakahendera bagikwasire bakagyisharaho omukira nabwanyima,  wakame enkarisa enkyende omukira gwayo.
author: Twinamasiko Julius

title: If I were
description: The story is about exploring with children what they would do if they were.
author: Kabubbu pilot site

title: Ngitshele...manje! Imibala
description: We ask why things are different colours.

title: Bilamba na ngai ya kelasi
description: Ezali na muana ya moke na kombo ya Sophie azali komeka mbilamba ya kelasi nkasi mosusu ezali muke,  mosusu pe minene.
author: Dorine Kamin

title: A Hawu Yiga a Mudoza Wa Yona
description: That rabbit is at it again! Can you trust him?
author: Rafael Ernesto Samuel

title: Adurroota Caalaa
description: Caalaan Adurroota saddeeti fi saree tokko qaba. Sareen isaa Tolaa jedhama.
author: Mulualem Daba

title: Njagala nyo okusoma
description: Luno lugero olukwata ku mulenzi omuto ayagala enyo okusoma engero. Akyagala nyo nti ayagala okugabana olugero ne'abegganda.
author: CATHERINE NAKATO

title: Haŋambi N'Ehudu
description: Haŋambi sigenda meriwe Wanehudu alye hu pama jije enoli. Ehyo hyamuleetera ohusalira owahye olugesi era galya gahenaŋo n'atamuŋaayeho. Ehyo hyaleetera Wanehudu ohusala amagesi ohumwegalula. Gamulanga amuhyalire mu mago gage mu lwabi era gahola ehisoboha Haŋambi yesi gaŋwaŋo atyo n'ataliiye.
author: Mera Stephen

title: Ukuba Bengi…….
description: The story is about exploring with children what they would do if they were...
author: Zama Kunene

title: (Colour-in) Mr Motaung's thirds
description: Colour-in storybook. A story about thirds,  and lunch. (This storybook was made possible by a grant from the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Lindiwe Tshabalala

title: Anansi Ka Akumaach
description: Nyesaki Anasi akimor ng'abiyasia ka lopaekeng, Akumaach, na kaneni abu king'ala ng'esi atamar toloto tasakasi ng'adis.Na kaneni na epeyounio Akumaach Anansi nawi keng na ikipikinit, abu Akumaach kiyook atamar emam akimuj awi keng eir Anansi.
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: Kiti dza Selemeng
description: Selemeng ane kiti dzakawanda. Selemeng ane kiti ngani?
author: Lilian Chaminuka

title: Chianga chiane chiesukuru
description: Ase omogano oyo omwana nigo akoerengia chianaga chinge,  chinene na echi chimoisane. Omogano oyo nigo orwete ase "SEED story" korwa eyunibasiti ya Kwazulu-Natal.
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: Kungabya……
description: Olhughano lhuhambangene okwa ekyabanabalere bangakolire kubabya…….
author: Jenipher  Kabugho

title: Njagala nyo okusoma
description: Olugelo luno luli kumulenzi omuto ayagla nyo okusoma engero. Akyagalanyo kubanga ayagala okugabana ne famileye.
author: Stellah Nakiranda

title: My school clothes
description: In this story a child tries on clothes that are too big,  too small,  and just right. It is an adaptation of 'School Clothes' (University of Kwazulu-Natal SEED story).
author: African Storybook

title: የአቶ ሞታኡንግ ሲሶዎች
description: ቀለም አልባ የተረት መጽሐፍ፡፡ የሲሶዎችና የምሳ ታሪክ፡፡ (ይህ የተረት መጽሐፍ በኦፐንሃይመር መታሰቢያ ድርጅት ድጋፍ የተዘጋጀ ነው፡፡)
author: Mezemir Girma

title: اووم ټولګی- تجوید
description: د افغانستان د پوهنی وزارت د نصاب کتابونه

title: Anansi Ne Likhutu
description: Anansi siyenyanga okhukabana amapwoni kaye amanulu nende omwitsa waye Likhutu, ne amukatia obulali okhuliakho tawe. Kho Likhutu nilimulanga  atsie nango we wamatsi,  khu fiakhulia fia angolobe. Likhutu likhakanga khula ngala Anansi yalakhaywa okhusangalira efiakhulia fiaye.
author: Catherine Were

title: Singa nali
description: Embozi eno egema kukulambura na abaana ku ebyo byebayinza okukola singa baali ekyo.
author: Cornelius Mugulusi

title: Nkanu aambukizwa kipindupindu
description: Nkanu anaambukizwa kipindupindu kutokana na uchafu wake.
author: gabriel dibwe

title: Ebibusi bia Selemeng'
description: Selemeng' nigo abwate ebibusi ebinge. Ebibusi birenga Selemeng' abwate?
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: Selemeng's cats
description: Selemeng has many cats. How many cats does Selemeng have?
author: Khothatso Ranoosi

title: Nnendha okusoma
description: Luno olufumo lugema ku kalenzi akato akendha okusoma enfumo. Ka kyendha inho kasobole okugabana n'abendhuuye.
author: Alice Gonza

title: Anansi E a Tartaruga
description: Anansi não quer partilhar o seu delicioso inhame com a sua amiga, a tartaruga e engana-a para que não consiga provar nenhum. Assim, quando a tartaruga convida Anansi para jantar na sua casa na água, a tartaruga assegura que Anansi também não consegue tocar na comida.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Ifi u ikyume i ahir
description: Mama ta mbayev nav kwagh-hir,  u Pasen ve er i er man Ikyume i lu sha kwav-Aondo yo.
author: Mimi  Werna

title: Mr Motaung's thirds
description: A story about thirds,  and lunch. (This storybook was made possible by a grant from the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Lindiwe Tshabalala

title: Izingubo zami zesikole
description: Kule ndaba umntwana ulinganisa izingubo ezinkulu kakhulu,  ezincane kakhulu nezinye ezilingana kahle. Le ndaba ithathelwe endabeni ethi 'Izingubo zesikole' (University of KwaZulu- Natal SEED).
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Nkunda  Gusoma
description: Iyi nkuru ivuga ku mwana wakundaga gusoma inkuru. Yakundaga kuzisangiza umuryango we.
author: Faustin Bagiringabire

title: اووم ټولګی- عربی
description: د افغانستان د پوهنی وزارت د نصاب کتابونه

title: Anansi Le Khudu
description: Anansi ga a batle go kgaogana dijo tsa gagwe le tsala ya gagwe, Khudu. O tsietsa Khudu mme Khudu le ena o tlhotlhomisa gore Anansi ga a je dijo tsa gagwe ka nako e a neng a mo laleditse ko ga gagwe kwa nokeng.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Les chats de Selemeng
description: Selemeng a beaucoup de chats. Combien en a-t-il ?
author: Translators without Borders

title: Irèhu Ogaazi ana nyi Ivopa
description: Onyií a' ka yozi an itopa ogaazi me na yí ihénèba.
author: Aisha Oiza Elamah

title: Ngũa syakwa sya sukulu
description: Ĩĩ nĩ ngewa ya kana kakwela ngũa nene mũno kwa ko,  kana nini mũno,  kana ikeanĩe. Ngewa ĩĩ Ĩandĩkĩtwe kuma ngewa ĩngĩ ĩtawa 'School Clothes' (University of Kwazulu-Natal SEED story).
author: Anna Kula

title: Nkunda Gusoma
description: Iyi ni inkuru y'umuhungu ukunda gusoma inkuru z'amateka. Akunda gusoma cyane ku buryo yumva yasomera umuryango we.
author: Fulgence Ntibatekereza

title: Okuthathu kuka Baba uMotaung
description: Indatjana le imayelana nokuthathu,  nesidlo semini. (This storybook was made possible by a grant from the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust).
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Nkunda gusoma
description: Iyi ni inkuru y'umuhungu ukunda gusoma inkuru z'amateka. Akunda gusoma cyane ku buryo yumva yasomera umuryango we.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Amakati kaZamo
description: UZamo unamakati amaningi. Ake sibone ukuthi unamakati amangaki.
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Colores en la calle
description: Hay tanto para ver en las calles. Únete a Sonu, Monu y Rina en una colorida caminata por las calles.

title: SLEEP AND GLOW
description: The story is about a little child whom the parents are praising and now comforting the child to sleep by sing a little lullaby.
